item.description:
Hey everyone!

I will be holding a fundraising event at McFadden's on Saturday, May 12 from 6-9! This will be an especially fun day because I'll be running my first 20 miler in preparation for the full marathon!

There will be food, alcohol, and lots and lots of raffles! The event will be held upstairs.

Visit my Team in Training Page to see more about the funds I'm trying to raise and my support in trying to find a cure for blood cancers.

http://pages.teamintraining.org/ma/rnr12/LstonewLoo

Hope to see everyone there! Invite anyone and everyone you know!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Marathon Party
